directions: In a blender blend all ingredients except oil until smooth. With motor running, add oil in a stream and blend dressing until emulsified. Transfer vinaigrette to a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Vinaigrette keeps, covered and chilled, 1 week.
ingredients: 1/3 cup finely chopped peeled fresh gingerroot
1/2 teaspoon dried red pepper flakes, or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
*available at Asian markets and many specialty foods shops and supermarkets
title: Spicy Ginger Vinaigrette
